_sText:
This was a quick build for my friend in the clan HoF, which for short, stands for Hero's of Faith.  Hopefully they, and all who choose to play this will like it.

It's a medium size surf with different choices of paths to take, due to the great amount of air that is possible from the main drop.  It is a continuous surf, in that you can basically keep surfing the map without stopping to often, and just keep gaining more and more speed. 

I know some will criticize it, but it was a very quick build.  Enjoy.
